channel.title: [Hyperion] Logging in with Symbols in game
channel.description:
Would anyone know how to fix the fact that on my server players are able to log in with any symbol and spoof peoples usernames?
for example:
"#Ryan" shows up in yell and regular chat as just "Ryan".
Anyway to block all symbol characters from logging in?

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Doesn’t hyperion already have this? When the login request is received, run the player’s username through an array to validate all characters - a simple for-loop should suffice. The username is obtained near the end of login in the 317 protocol, read this for more information on the login protocol.

ps AFAIK Hyperion is a 317 (read it somewhere).
